item.title: CES 2012
item.dc:creator: AlexWho
item.description: Come see AlexWho at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas, NV the week of January 9th. Who knows, he may even sign an autographed picture for you… or punch you in the face! For those of you that don’t know what CES is, The International Consumer Electronics Show (CES) is a major technology-related trade show held each January in the Las Vegas Convention Center, Las Vegas, Nevada, United States. Not open to the public, the Consumer Electronics Association-sponsored show typically hosts previews of products and new product announcements. CES rose to prominence after COMDEX was canceled.
item.content:encoded:
Come see AlexWho at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES)
in Las Vegas, NV the week of January 9th.
Who knows, he may even sign an autographed picture for you…
or punch you in the face!

For those of you that don’t know what CES is, The International Consumer Electronics Show (CES) is a major technology-related trade show held each January in the Las Vegas Convention Center, Las Vegas, Nevada, United States. Not open to the public, the Consumer Electronics Association-sponsored show typically hosts previews of products and new product announcements. CES rose to prominence after COMDEX was canceled.
